message.content: Create a Kanban board app with drag and drop columns and cards.

content.text: I'll create a Kanban board app with drag and drop functionality. Let me start by setting up the project structure.

todos.content: Create Kanban board component with columns
Implement drag and drop for cards

content.text: Now let me create the main KanbanBoard component with drag and drop.
Now let me add basic styling and then run verification.

content.content:
Running verification...

✓ bun run check — 0 issues  
✓ bun run typecheck — no errors

All checks passed!

content.text:
Kanban board is ready! Created files:
- `src/index.tsx` - Entry point
- `src/components/KanbanBoard.tsx` - Main board with 3 columns (To Do, In Progress, Done)
- `src/components/Column.tsx` - Droppable column component
- `src/components/TaskCard.tsx` - Draggable task card component
- `src/styles.css` - Basic styling
- `index.html` - HTML entry

Uses @dnd-kit for drag and drop. Run `bun dev` to start the app.
